name: Nile Rhythms Music Festival
description: Immerse yourself in the vibrant sounds of Egyptian and international music at the Nile Rhythms Music Festival. Join us this March 2026 at the renowned El Sawy Culturewheel in Cairo for an unforgettable series of performances. Experience diverse genres from folk to contemporary, celebrate artistic expression, and enjoy the lively atmosphere by the Nile. This festival promises a captivating blend of melodies and cultural exchange for all music enthusiasts.

name: Alexandria Ancient Art Exhibition
description: Discover the timeless beauty of ancient Egyptian and Greco-Roman artistry at the Alexandria Ancient Art Exhibition. This April 2026, the magnificent Bibliotheca Alexandrina in Alexandria opens its doors to a rare collection of artifacts, sculptures, and historical masterpieces. Delve into centuries of history, explore intricate craftsmanship, and gain insights into the rich cultural heritage that shaped this legendary city. An enlightening journey for history buffs.

name: Luxor Hot Air Balloon Festival
description: Witness the spectacular Luxor Hot Air Balloon Festival, an annual spectacle illuminating the skies. In January 2026, join us at the enchanting West Bank launch sites in Luxor for a breathtaking aerial display over ancient temples and monuments. Experience dawn flights offering unparalleled views of the Valley of the Kings and Queens, creating truly magical memories. A stunning event combining adventure with historical wonder in the heart of Upper Egypt.

name: Cairo International Film Festival Gala
description: Experience the glamour of Egyptian cinema at the Cairo International Film Festival Gala. This November 2026, the prestigious Cairo Opera House in Cairo will host an evening dedicated to celebrating cinematic excellence. Walk the red carpet alongside stars, attend exclusive screenings, and witness the recognition of groundbreaking films and talent from across the globe and the Arab world. An unmissable event for film enthusiasts and industry professionals alike.

name: Aswan Cultural Heritage Week
description: Celebrate the rich heritage of Nubia during Aswan Cultural Heritage Week. This February 2026, the vibrant Nubian Village in Aswan invites you to explore traditional customs, crafts, and music. Engage with local artisans, savor authentic Nubian cuisine, and enjoy captivating folkloric performances. Discover the warmth and hospitality of the community while learning about their unique history and traditions by the majestic Nile River. A truly immersive cultural experience.

name: Giza Pyramids Sound & Light Show Premier
description: Be among the first to experience the revamped Pyramids Sound & Light Show Premier. Join us this December 2026 at the iconic Pyramids Plateau in Giza for an evening of awe-inspiring visual storytelling. Witness the ancient wonders illuminated with cutting-edge technology, narrating the legendary history of pharaohs and monumental structures. This spectacular event promises a magical journey through time against the backdrop of Egypt's most famous landmarks.

name: Sharm El Sheikh Diving & Marine Life Expo
description: Dive into the wonders of the Red Sea at the Sharm El Sheikh Diving & Marine Life Expo. This October 2026, the Naama Bay area in Sharm El Sheikh will host exhibitors and experts dedicated to marine conservation and underwater exploration. Discover new diving gear, attend workshops, and learn about the diverse ecosystems of this world-renowned diving destination. An essential event for divers, conservationists, and sea lovers.

name: Siwa Oasis Olive Harvest Festival
description: Experience the timeless traditions of the Siwa Oasis at its annual Olive Harvest Festival. In September 2026, join the local community near the historic Shali Fortress in Siwa for a celebration of their bountiful olive groves. Participate in age-old harvesting practices, savor freshly pressed olive oil, and enjoy traditional Siwan music and dances. This authentic cultural event offers a unique glimpse into the sustainable life of this serene desert oasis.

name: Port Said Maritime Heritage Day
description: Explore the rich naval history of Egypt during Port Said Maritime Heritage Day. This May 2026, the Suez Canal Authority Building in Port Said will open its doors to a day of exhibitions and talks. Learn about the strategic importance of the Suez Canal, witness historical maritime artifacts, and engage with experts on Egypt's seafaring legacy. A fascinating event for those interested in naval history and engineering marvels.

name: El Gouna Jazz Festival
description: Groove to the smooth sounds of international and local jazz artists at the El Gouna Jazz Festival. This August 2026, the chic El Gouna Marina in El Gouna will transform into a vibrant hub for music lovers. Enjoy live performances against the stunning Red Sea backdrop, indulge in exquisite dining, and soak up the sophisticated atmosphere. A perfect blend of world-class music and a luxurious resort experience.

This June 2026, the dynamic AUC Tahrir Campus in Cairo will host a stunning display of contemporary Egyptian design. Explore groundbreaking works from local and international designers across various disciplines, including fashion, architecture, and product design. Engage with creators, attend inspiring talks, and discover the future of design in Egypt's bustling capital.

This July 2026, the scenic Lighthouse Reef area in Dahab will host discussions on sustainable tourism practices and responsible travel. Learn about preserving the natural beauty of Sinai, engage in workshops on eco-friendly initiatives, and connect with like-minded individuals. A crucial event for promoting responsible tourism in one of Egypt's most beautiful coastal towns.

place: Valley of the Kings Visitor Center
